short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides quick icon access to your Chrome extensions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improves upon the original Extensions Button extension.

- Only ever opens a single extensions tab
- Open source

Source available at https://git.io/vuuSc
